function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Higher average scores for software and hardware in Group A compared to Group B may indicate unequal access to technology for remote work.","Impact":"Unequal access to technology can lead to disparities in productivity and performance, and may contribute to unequal opportunities for career advancement and professional development.","Mitigation":"Provide equal access to technology for all employees, offer training and support for remote work, and create policies to address disparities in technology access.","Technologies":"Remote collaboration tools, cloud-based software, video conferencing technology.","People":"Employees, particularly those in Group B.","Owner":"Employers and IT departments."},{"Description":"Differences in the perceived impact of COVID-19 on the construction industry between Group A and Group B may reflect variations in experiences and perspectives related to the pandemic.","Impact":"Differences in perception may lead to misunderstandings, conflict, and challenges in decision-making related to COVID-19 response and recovery efforts.","Mitigation":"Facilitate open communication, provide opportunities for shared understanding and dialogue, and consider diverse perspectives when making decisions related to COVID-19 response.","Technologies":"Communication platforms, survey tools for gathering feedback and input.","People":"Employees, management, and stakeholders in the construction industry.","Owner":"Management, human resources, and communication teams."}]}
